div.p: The Ultimate Beginner-Friendly Video Editing Cohort to Kickstart Your Freelance Career Turn your curiosity for video editing into a profitable career. Learn editing, visual effects, and how to land high-paying clients.

Whether you want to freelance, build an agency, or grow your personal brand, this course will give you the roadmap for everything from scratch. No prior experience needed. Just your passion for creating great videos! Join now and start earning with video editing!

button.class: btn btn-kreator-yellow-900 fw-bold text-black px-4 py-2 rounded shadow-sm mt-3

span.t: This course takes you from absolute basic to professional-level video editing and also teaches you how to get your first freelance gig, how to start your own agency, how to grow on your socials. This course gives you a step-by-step blueprint to start making money as a video editor.
No fluff. No outdated methods. Only proven strategies that work in 2025. Because video editing shouldn’t just be a hobby—it should pay you!

div.class: row aboutme_section d-flex flex-wrap align-items-center justify-content-left
col-md-4 col-12 d-flex flex-column gap-3 align-items-center text-center

div.span: a 7-figure social media agency specializing in content strategy and brand growth.

div.div: I have built an audience of over 1 million followers across Instagram and YouTube by creating high-impact, viral finance content. Through strategic collaborations with top brands like Poker Baazi, Paytm, and WeWork, I have delivered content strategies and brand-building solutions that drive engagement and growth. Additionally, as a public speaker and mentor, I guide young entrepreneurs and content creators on scaling their brands and careers.

div.span: I had zero experience in video editing before taking this course, and now I feel confident enough to edit professional-quality videos! The lessons are well-structured, easy to follow, and packed with practical tips. Highly recommended for beginners!

div.class: section3_shadow p-4 text-center d-flex flex-column gap-3 rounded-30 bg-kreator-yellow-300

div.span: As a freelancer, I was looking for a course that teaches not just editing skills but also how to monetize them. This course nailed it! The freelancing tips alone are worth the price. If you're serious about making money with video editing, this is the course for you.

div.class: section3_shadow p-4 text-center d-flex flex-column gap-3 rounded-30 bg-kreator-yellow-300

div.span: I've taken a few video editing courses before, but this one stands out. The instructor makes everything so engaging and relatable. The real-world examples and hands-on projects helped me apply what I learned instantly. Loved it!

div.class: section3_shadow p-4 text-center d-flex flex-column gap-3 rounded-30 bg-kreator-yellow-300

div.span: I wanted to upskill and add video editing to my resume, and this course delivered beyond expectations. The step-by-step breakdown of tools, techniques, and industry insights made it super valuable. It’s a must-have for anyone looking to get into video editing.

div.div: Which software will I learn in this course?
You will learn Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe After Effects in this Course.
How much money can I earn after completing this course?
As a skilled video editor, Your earning potential can be anywhere between ₹50,000 - ₹1,00,000 per month
Will I receive any resources to help me?
Yes, we will provide you many assets including png, sound effects, or video overlays
Will I be able to get a job as video editor after completion of this course?
Yes, this will make you ready for the job market within 3 months of practicing
Are there any hardware requirements for this course?

For our Video Editing Course, we recommend the following configuration for the best editing experience:
Hardware:Intel i5 or i7 processor
Dedicated GPU (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce or AMD Radeon)
16GB of RAM for enhanced editing performance
